name: Kissed by the Stars
description:
Play a chapter of the life of the magical Monster Doctor. 

Will this new encounter have him head over heels in love with this mysterious new being?

Or will he continue his journey on his own?

**build updated to fix ending and About screen crash

--

A visual novel created for the 48hr  Wholesome Games Jam 2020

Prompt: Don't Give Up

Created by:

  • T Chase (@chasecubed) - Programmer, Story/Writer, Compiling
  • Angela Geiss (@secondshow) - Sound Design/Composing
  • Mark Fiveash (@stealthnacho) - Art/Design
